name: MTLResourceOptions
desc: Optional arguments used to set the behavior of a resource.

items.name: static var cpuCacheModeWriteCombined: MTLResourceOptions
items.desc: A write-combined CPU cache mode that is optimized for resources that the CPU writes into, but never reads.

items.name: static var storageModeShared: MTLResourceOptions
items.desc: The resource is stored in system memory and is accessible to both the CPU and the GPU.

items.name: static var storageModeManaged: MTLResourceOptions
items.desc: The CPU and GPU may maintain separate copies of the resource, and any changes must be explicitly synchronized.

items.name: static var storageModePrivate: MTLResourceOptions
items.desc: The resource can be accessed only by the GPU.

items.name: static var storageModeMemoryless: MTLResourceOptions
items.desc: The resourceâ€™s contents can be accessed only by the GPU and only exist temporarily during a render pass.

items.name: static var hazardTrackingModeTracked: MTLResourceOptions
items.desc: An option specifying that Metal prevents hazards when modifying this object's contents.

items.name: static var hazardTrackingModeUntracked: MTLResourceOptions
items.desc: An option specifying that the app must prevent hazards when modifying this object's contents.
